    Interface Description
    es.situm.sdk.utils.filter.Filterable
    Use a for with an if to filter the collection

  • Enums 
    Enum Description
    es.situm.sdk.directions.DirectionsRequest.AccessibilityMode
    es.situm.sdk.location.LocationRequest.IndoorProvider
    This Enum is no longer used, the SDK always computes the geolocations in the same way (in the device without continuosly accessing the internet, behaving like the old INPHONE mode).
    es.situm.sdk.utils.filter.Filter.FilterMode
    Use a for with an if to filter the collection
  • Annotation Types 
    Annotation Type Description
    es.situm.sdk.communication.CommunicationOptions
  • Fields 
    Field Description
    es.situm.sdk.location.LocationManager.Code.MISSING_BACKGROUND_LOCATION_PERMISSION
    This error is not used and will never be thrown.
  • Methods 
    Method Description
    es.situm.sdk.communication.CommunicationManager.eventClicked​(EventOccurrence, Handler<EventOccurrence>)
    use CommunicationManager.updateOccurrence(EventOccurrence, EventAction, Handler) instead
    es.situm.sdk.communication.CommunicationManager.eventConverted​(EventOccurrence, Handler<EventOccurrence>)
    use CommunicationManager.updateOccurrence(EventOccurrence, EventAction, Handler) instead
    es.situm.sdk.communication.CommunicationManager.eventSeen​(SitumEvent, Handler<EventOccurrence>)
    use CommunicationManager.createOccurrenceForEvent(SitumEvent, Handler) instead
    es.situm.sdk.communication.CommunicationManager.fetchBuildingInfo​(Building, Handler<BuildingInfo>)
    use CommunicationManager.fetchBuildingInfo(String, Handler) instead
    es.situm.sdk.communication.CommunicationManager.fetchBuildings​(Map<String, Object>, Handler<Collection<Building>>)
    use CommunicationManager.fetchBuildings(CommunicationConfig, Handler) instead
    es.situm.sdk.communication.CommunicationManager.fetchCalibratedArea​(Building, Floor, Handler<Collection<CalibrationArea>>)
    Use CalibrationManager.fetchActiveGtScans(Floor, Handler)
    es.situm.sdk.communication.CommunicationManager.fetchCalibrationBleScans​(Building, Floor, Handler<Scans>)
    Use CalibrationManager.fetchActiveBleScans(Floor, Handler)
    es.situm.sdk.communication.CommunicationManager.fetchCalibrationWifiScans​(Building, Floor, Handler<Scans>)
    Use CalibrationManager.fetchActiveWifiScans(Floor, Handler)
    es.situm.sdk.communication.CommunicationManager.fetchEventsFromBuilding​(Building, Handler<Collection<SitumEvent>>)
    use CommunicationManager.fetchEventsFromBuilding(String, Handler) instead
    es.situm.sdk.communication.CommunicationManager.fetchFloorsFromBuilding​(Building, Handler<Collection<Floor>>)
    use CommunicationManager.fetchFloorsFromBuilding(String, Handler) instead
    es.situm.sdk.communication.CommunicationManager.fetchGeofencesFromBuilding​(Building, Map<String, Object>, Handler<List<Geofence>>)
    use CommunicationManager.fetchGeofencesFromBuilding(Building, CommunicationConfig, Handler) instead
    es.situm.sdk.communication.CommunicationManager.fetchIndoorPOIsFromBuilding​(Building, Handler<Collection<Poi>>)
    use CommunicationManager.fetchIndoorPOIsFromBuilding(String, Handler) instead
    es.situm.sdk.communication.CommunicationManager.fetchMapFromFloor​(Floor, Map<String, Object>, Handler<Bitmap>)
    use CommunicationManager.fetchMapFromFloor(Floor, CommunicationConfig, Handler) instead
    es.situm.sdk.communication.CommunicationManager.fetchOutdoorPOIsFromBuilding​(Building, Handler<Collection<Poi>>)
    use CommunicationManager.fetchOutdoorPOIsFromBuilding(String, Handler) instead
    es.situm.sdk.communication.CommunicationManager.fetchPoiCategories​(Map<String, Object>, Handler<Collection<PoiCategory>>)
    use CommunicationManager.fetchPoiCategories(CommunicationConfig, Handler) instead
    es.situm.sdk.communication.CommunicationManager.fetchPoiCategoryIconNormal​(PoiCategory, Handler<Bitmap>)
    use CommunicationManager.fetchPoiCategoryIcon(PoiCategory, boolean, Handler) instead
    es.situm.sdk.communication.CommunicationManager.fetchPoiCategoryIconSelected​(PoiCategory, Handler<Bitmap>)
    use CommunicationManager.fetchPoiCategoryIcon(PoiCategory, boolean, Handler) instead
    es.situm.sdk.communication.CommunicationManager.fetchRailWidth​(Building, Handler<Float>)
    use CommunicationManager.fetchRailWidth(String, Handler) instead
    es.situm.sdk.communication.CommunicationManager.prefetchPositioningInfo​(Map<String, Object>, Handler<String>)
    use CommunicationManager.prefetchPositioningInfo(CommunicationConfig, Handler) instead
    es.situm.sdk.communication.CommunicationManager.updateRailWidth​(Building, float, Handler<Object>)
    use CommunicationManager.updateRailWidth(String, float, Handler) instead
    es.situm.sdk.communication.HttpRequest.getResponseDestinationFile()
    es.situm.sdk.directions.DirectionsRequest.Builder.accessibilityMode​(DirectionsRequest.AccessibilityMode)
    es.situm.sdk.directions.DirectionsRequest.Builder.isAccessible​(boolean)
    es.situm.sdk.directions.DirectionsRequest.isAccessible()
    es.situm.sdk.directions.DirectionsRequest.minimizeFloorChanges()
    es.situm.sdk.location.LocationRequest.Builder.indoorProvider​(LocationRequest.IndoorProvider)
    Do not use. The indoor provider is LocationRequest.IndoorProvider.INPHONE by default and can not be changed.
    es.situm.sdk.location.LocationRequest.getIndoorProvider()
    Indoor provider is LocationRequest.IndoorProvider.INPHONE by default and can not be changed.
    es.situm.sdk.location.OutdoorLocationOptions.Builder.averageSnrThreshold​(float)
    This feaure is not supported from Android 12 onward, and will be removed in future SDK versions.
    es.situm.sdk.location.OutdoorLocationOptions.Builder.enableOpenSkyDetector​(boolean)
    This feaure is not supported from Android 12 onward, and will be removed in future SDK versions.
    es.situm.sdk.location.OutdoorLocationOptions.Builder.minNumberSatellitesToRunDetector​(int)
    (Open Sky Detector only) Not used anymore. Use OutdoorLocationOptions.Builder.averageSnrThreshold(float) instead.
    es.situm.sdk.location.OutdoorLocationOptions.Builder.minPercentageToDetectOutdoor​(float)
    (Open Sky Detector only) Not used anymore. Use OutdoorLocationOptions.Builder.averageSnrThreshold(float) instead
    es.situm.sdk.location.OutdoorLocationOptions.Builder.minSnrToUseSatellite​(float)
    (Open Sky Detector only) Not used anymore. Use OutdoorLocationOptions.Builder.averageSnrThreshold(float) instead.
    es.situm.sdk.location.OutdoorLocationOptions.Builder.userDefinedThreshold​(boolean)
    (Open Sky Detector only). Do not use.
    es.situm.sdk.location.OutdoorLocationOptions.enableOpenSkyDetector()
    This feaure is not supported from Android 12 onward, and will be removed in future SDK versions.
    es.situm.sdk.location.OutdoorLocationOptions.getAverageSnrThreshold()
    This feaure is not supported from Android 12 onward, and will be removed in future SDK versions.
    es.situm.sdk.location.OutdoorLocationOptions.overrideSnrServervalue()  
    es.situm.sdk.model.cartography.Floor.Builder.level​(int)
    use Floor.Builder.floor(int) instead
    es.situm.sdk.model.cartography.Floor.getLevel()
    use Floor.getFloor() instead
    es.situm.sdk.model.cartography.Geofence.Builder.description​(String)
    use Geofence.Builder.infoHtml instead
    es.situm.sdk.model.cartography.Geofence.getDescription()
    this method is replaced by @link #getInfoHtml()
    es.situm.sdk.model.directions.Route.isAccessible()
    es.situm.sdk.model.navigation.NavigationProgress.Builder.closestRoutePoint​(Point)
    Use NavigationProgress.Builder.closestLocationInRoute(Location)
    es.situm.sdk.model.navigation.NavigationProgress.getClosestPointInRoute()
    Use NavigationProgress.getClosestLocationInRoute()
    es.situm.sdk.v1.SitumEvent.getBuildingId()
    Use getTrigger()
    es.situm.sdk.v1.SitumEvent.getConversionArea()
    Use getConversion()
    es.situm.sdk.v1.SitumEvent.getFloor_id()
    Use getTrigger()
    es.situm.sdk.v1.SitumEvent.getRadius()
    Use getTrigger()
    es.situm.sdk.v1.SitumEvent.getX()
    Use getTrigger()
    es.situm.sdk.v1.SitumEvent.getY()
    Use getTrigger()
    es.situm.sdk.v1.SitumEvent.notifyClicked​(Context, String)
    use CommunicationManager.eventClicked(EventOccurrence, Map, Handler) instead
    es.situm.sdk.v1.SitumEvent.notifyConverted​(Context, String)
    use CommunicationManager.eventConverted(EventOccurrence, Map, Handler) instead
    es.situm.sdk.v1.SitumEvent.notifySeen​(Context, String)
    use CommunicationManager.eventSeen(SitumEvent, Map, Handler) instead

    Constructor Description
    es.situm.sdk.model.calibration.LocalCalibration​(String, String, int, Date)
    es.situm.sdk.model.organization.OrganizationTheme​(String, String, ThemeColors, URL)  
  • Enum Constants 
    Enum Constant Description
    es.situm.sdk.directions.DirectionsRequest.AccessibilityMode.ONLY_ACCESSIBLE
    To use this option with the new interface you have to create a DirectionsModifier and add a TagModifier prioritizing DirectionsModifier.LEGACY_OPTIONS.ACCESSIBLE
    es.situm.sdk.directions.DirectionsRequest.AccessibilityMode.ONLY_NOT_ACCESSIBLE_FLOOR_CHANGES
    To use this option with the new interface you have to create a DirectionsModifier and add a TagModifier prioritizing DirectionsModifier.LEGACY_OPTIONS.NOT_ACCESSIBLE
    es.situm.sdk.location.LocationRequest.IndoorProvider.CLOUD
    INPHONE mode will be used instead
    es.situm.sdk.location.LocationRequest.IndoorProvider.HYBRID
    INPHONE mode will be used instead
    es.situm.sdk.location.LocationRequest.IndoorProvider.SUPPORT
    INPHONE mode will be used instead
    es.situm.sdk.location.LocationStatus.NO_CONNECTION
    Warning: no internet connection is available (Situm SDK will not be able to download Positioning Models).
